architectural_decisions.rationale: User requirement: no new databases. Turso already supports all required operations.
architectural_decisions.impact: All new tables added as migrations, no schema breaks

architectural_decisions.decision: Preserve OpenRouter as AI service provider
architectural_decisions.rationale: User requirement: no new AI providers. OpenRouter already routes to all required models.
architectural_decisions.impact: Enhance existing model-router.ts with beta features

architectural_decisions.decision: All changes are additive (no breaking changes)
architectural_decisions.rationale: User requirement: must not break the app. Backward compatibility essential.
architectural_decisions.impact: New services are independent modules, existing routes remain functional

architectural_decisions.rationale: Risk mitigation: gradual rollout allows testing without affecting existing users
architectural_decisions.impact: New features can be enabled/disabled per project or user

architectural_decisions.decision: Both Builder and Fix My App use same enhanced capabilities
architectural_decisions.rationale: User requirement: both modes should use the Ultimate Builder features
architectural_decisions.impact: Shared verification swarm, intent lock, error escalation across modes

architectural_decisions.rationale: User stated no UI overhaul required, just slight modifications for AI communication
architectural_decisions.impact: Add SpeedDial, IntelligenceToggles, Phase/Verification indicators only

technical_choices.choice: Opus 4.5 for critical phases (Intent Lock, Intent Satisfaction, Tournament Judge)
technical_choices.rationale: Anthropic research shows Opus with high effort provides 4.3% better performance

technical_choices.choice: 6 parallel verification agents with different polling intervals
technical_choices.rationale: Continuous verification catches issues immediately, parallel reduces latency
